Holiday notice: Payment processing pauses during holidays in Dec 2024 and Jan 2025
Bitstamp incoming and outgoing USD, EUR, and GBP payments will be paused during the holidays in December 2024 and January 2025 in the US, EU, and UK.

USD payments

Due to the upcoming public holidays, Bitstamp’s bank payment clearing system for incoming and outgoing USD payments won’t be available on December 25, 2024, and January 1, 2025. Deposits and withdrawals will be processed the next business day.

EUR and GBP payments

Similarly, for EUR and GBP payments, the system will be paused on December 25 and 26, 2024, and January 1, 2025, except for Faster Payments and SEPA Instant payments, which will remain available. Deposits and withdrawals will be processed the next business day.

For all currencies Credit card, Google Pay, Apple Pay, and PayPal transfers will remain unaffected.

For any assistance or further information, please reach out to us at support@bitstamp.net.

Wishing all our customers a joyful holiday season!
